option.combatedit.warn.ingame: Changing these settings while in a world is experimental and could cause unexpected behaviour.
option.combatedit.warn.local_only: This configuration only applies to singleplayer worlds.
profile.combatedit.vanilla.name: Vanilla
profile.combatedit.1_8_combat.name: 1.8 Combat
option.combatedit.profile.custom_base_pr: Please note that this option is for using a data pack-provided base profile. If you simply want to make changes to another base profile, select that profile and add modifiers in the Entity and Item configuration tabs.
option.combatedit.item.item_attributes.m: Can be left empty to auto-generate an identifier.
error.combatedit.invalid_config.title: CombatEdit failed to load config
error.combatedit.invalid_config.descript:
CombatEdit failed to load your configuration! You can either correct errors in the configuration or reset it to the defaults.

Error message: %s
Check the logs for more details.
notification.combatedit.settings_load_er: Failed to load settings file. Please try restarting the game. See the logs for more information.
notification.combatedit.settings_save_er: Failed to save to settings file. Your modifications were not saved. See the logs for more information.
notification.combatedit.incompatibility_: The default attributes for some entity types could not be modified. Check the logs for more information.
The default attributes modifiers for some items could not be modified. Check the logs for more information.
command.combatedit.profile.get: The currently used base profile is %s
command.combatedit.profile.set: Set the current base profile to %s
command.combatedit.profile.set.error.inv: Could not find a base profile with ID %s
command.combatedit.profile.set.error.set: Failed to save the settings file, check the server logs for more information
